replies.message: Hi Russell. We’re sorry to hear that you didn’t enjoy your Facebook experience. If there is anything that you would change about it please let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Chantal
Why won't Facebook reply to my comment?
Hi Thomas. How can we help you? -Chantal

I manage my church's FB page, and I got a thing asking me to authenticate the page. In order to do that, I have to submit the phone number and a call would be received with a verification code. I have some questions: Is this real or a scam? Will the phone company charge for the call? What are the benefits? Facebook
I like facebook also I get to hear a lot of information and get to keep up with friends and family on facebook. I am so happy to get photographs that are current so I enjoy facebook :-) <3
We are so happy to hear that, Trichia! Thanks for sharing. -Chantal
Russell Runkin, then don't come here...
Facebook might make changes that we don't like, but it's a terrific way for making new friends from around the world, and keeping in touch with families.  I do enjoy Facebook!
i work for a bussiness i kinda have to there bud err mam xD
also if u dont like the changes we should stand up and speak our mind. not pretend we like it
"Chantel" is an automated server word recognition system, designed to reply to only positive words or phrases. ;-)
Hi there Oryan. Thanks for being part of our community. Hope you have a great day! -Chantal (the human).
